document.full_text: the body, which was still strapped in its seat on the air france plane that crashed on june 1, 2009, was raised early thursday from a debris field 3,900 meters below the surface of the atlantic.
document.title: europe: body in jet wreckage is retrieved from sea bottom
lines_and_colors: the body, which was still strapped in its seat on the air france plane that crashed on june 1, 2009, was raised early thursday from a debris field 3,900 meters below the surface of the atlantic.
